document_name: Ministerial resolution 15/2011 establishing the Committee on Climate Change and Clean Development
document_url: https://cdn.climatepolicyradar.org/QAT/2011/QAT-2011-01-02-Ministerial resolution 15_2011 establishing the Committee on Climate Change and Clean Development_472c40c7ddd0298262c9fdf8d6b13cc7.pdf
document_description: The resolution establishes the Committee on Climate Change and Clean Development. It was amended by resolution 37/2014.
